ape rajaya aakaryakshama bawa oba kiyayi.ape nithi parani wadi bawa oba kiyayi.nagara sabhawen kunu ekathu karagena yanne nathi bawa oba kiyayi.durakathana krimaya wirahitha wi athi bawa,dumriya sewaya wihiluwak wi athi bawa oba kiyayi.ape guwan sewaya lokaye narakama guwan sewaya bawath,liyumak kisidaka eya laga wiya yuthu sthanayata laga nowana bawath oba kiyayi.ape rata ballata gos athi bawath,walata wati athi bawath oba kiyayi.oba digin digatama kiyayi‚Ä¶kiyayi‚Ä¶kiyayi..

eya kalambu film sarkal prakashanayaki.lasantha wikramathunga, mahacharya abaya aaryasinha, sarath abegunawardhana, stanli kirinde, aananda hewaranhindage, di.di. dani, dadli wikramasinha, kulasiri rajapaksha, sunanda pushpakumara, aacharya sarathchandra jayakodi, lakshman kahatapitiya, layanal sarath, mahacharya anuradha senewirathna, prasila oopatha, layanal panduwawala, dabliw.ee.bi. da silwa, halthota pi.
